mapper.sql: ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, USABLE_STATUS, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATE
mapper.delete: update ROLE set USABLE_STATUS = 1 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

USABLE_STATUS = #{usableStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
